import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Axios from 'axios' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const Home = props => { const[cart, setCart]=useState([]); const PAGE_PRODUCTS="products"; const PAGE_CART="cart"; const PAGE_CHECKOUT="checkout"; const[page, setPage]=useState(PAGE_PRODUCTS); const {register, handleSubmit, errors}=useForm(); const Them = (data) => {} const navigateTo=(nextpage)=>{ setPage(nextpage); } const setQuality=(id, amount)=>{ const newCart=[...cart]; newCart.find((item)=>item.name===id.name).count=amount; setCart(newCart); } const addToCart=(id)=>{ let newCart=[...cart]; let iTempCart=newCart.find( (item)=>id.name===item.name ); if(iTempCart){ iTempCart.count++; } else{ iTempCart={ ...id, count:1, } newCart.push(iTempCart); } setCart(newCart); } const reMove=(id)=>{ setCart( cart.filter(pro=>{ return pro !== id; }) ) } const totalCart=()=>{ return cart.reduce((sum,{sale_price,count})=>sum+parseInt(sale_price)*parseInt(count),0) } const renderCheckout=()=>{ return(

)}

)}
